mapper.insert: insert into tbl_cart(userid, product_id, amount) values (#{userid}, #{product_id}, #{amount})
mapper.select: select c.cart_id, c.userid, p.product_id, m.username, p.product_name, c.amount, p.product_price, p.product_url, (product_price * amount) money from tbl_member m, tbl_cart c, tbl_product p where m.userid = c.userid and p.product_id = c.product_id and c.userid = #{userid} order by c.cart_id
mapper.update: update tbl_cart set amount = #{amount} where userid = #{userid} and product_id = #{product_id}
mapper.select: select count (*) from tbl_cart where userid = #{userid}
